meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rose Schaefer Catherine Briley Elyse Mancuso Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6375.

div.div:
2012 Teen Tournament final game 2.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Rose Schaefer, a junior from Portland, Oregon (subtotal of $12,400)
Catherine Briley, a senior from Grand Prairie, Louisiana (subtotal of $10,000)
Elyse Mancuso, a junior from Omaha, Nebraska (subtotal of $23,200)

tr.td: MAY DAYS
BEVERAGES
I LOVE METAL
HISTORICAL ENTERTAINMENT
PEOPLE
(Alex: Each correct response will be five letters long and will end in a "G" and an "O.")

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On May 30, 1536, just days after his wife Anne Boleyn was beheaded, he married Jane Seymour')

tr.td: On May 30, 1536, just days after his wife Anne Boleyn was beheaded, he married Jane Seymour

tr.td: Elyse
Catherine
Rose
PRE-CIVIL WAR AMERICA
RECENT OLYMPIC MEDALISTS
"B" WHERE?
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter B.)

(Alex: A little bit of everything.)

(Alex: The correct response is...)
ALSO A MUSICAL TERM

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Rose\'s response] You crossed off Taylor and then you wrote [*] and you squeezed him in. The future state of Iowa came to us as part of the Louisiana Purchase, and the man who was President was [*]. You\'re right.)
RoseWho is Taylor Jefferson?
$11,800
CatherineWho was Thomas Jefferson
$5,600
ElyseWho is Jefferson?
$28,000
Thomas Jefferson')
